content:
Big statement, but it is real!
I love singing since I was little, but song writing is new to me. Ever since I started it, so much has been going on in my mind and in my life, and oddly enough, I spend more time in ‚Äòsilence‚Äô now ‚Äî silence with music and stuff happening vividly in constancy.
I really enjoyed my current status and I want to keep it up!
So for those who listen to and like my songs at such an early stage, thank you so much for your support! It means a lot to me. And I sincerely hope that you‚Äôve enjoyed your journey in my music!
Cheers!
summary: Big statement, but it is real!
title: Music is everywhere
